name: dairyman
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a man who owns or works on a dairy farm (= one that produces milk or products made from milk): Organic dairymen are committed to raising their livestock free of drugs and animal hormones. His father was a dairyman and his mother a butcher's daughter.
More examplesFewer examplesGrass and clover grow well here, which is good for dairymen.Thomas worked as a cobbler and later as a dairyman.He quit being a dairyman to become a builder.Dairymen are going out of business even though the price of milk is at an all-time high.
